Items.text: My name is Mr. Morrison, but you can call me Coach.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: In this class, you will be learning how to fight.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Now, I know that some of you have certain powers that can help you fight. You might breathe fire or have super strength.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: But, I know that some of you don't.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: And you never know what might happen out in the real world.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Your powers might not be working or you might not be able to use them for some reason.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: But, knowing how to use your fists will always come in handy.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Today, each of you will be coming into the ring to learn how to hit and move around in a fight.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Now, can I get any volunteers for who wants to go first?
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: You were the only person to raise your hand. You look like an idiot.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Well, no one wants to go? Ok then I guess I'll pick you.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Coach is pointing right at you.
Why don't you come up here champ, and we can get started.
Items.name: Gym Teacher
